title: Ten Hag's Decisions Deliver
description:
The FC crew react to Manchester United's 2-1 victory over Liverpool in the Red Devils' first victory of the season. The guys break down Trent Alexander-Arnold's abysmal defensive performance, question if Liverpool need to make a last minute signing to bolster their midfield and if Manchester United can sustain this kind of performance against teams that drop off against bigger clubs.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: Man United defeat Liverpool in first victory of the season; Do Liverpool need to make last minute transfers?; Can Man United replicate this performance against a worse team?
